declare @UserId bigint=#{requestUser}, @PurchaseRequest_Auto bigint=#{purchaseRequestAuto}, @AppMemo nvarchar(500), @Appstatus int, @IsAgent int=0, @PurchaseRRFlow_Auto bigint, @AgentUserID bigint, @utype int=1
--2019/12/31 审核流程修改 1000<金额<5000由副总核决 金额>=5000由总经理核决 营业副总和内勤副总平行 --2018/02/23 审核流程修改 1000<金额<=5000由副总核决 金额>5000由总经理核决 --2017 取消现金出纳、财务主管审核 --请购请款审核人类别(0:总经理室;1:处主管；2：管理部主管;3：财务主管；4：现金出纳；5：网银出纳；6：财务授权1；7：财务授权2；8：部门验收；9：现金会计；10：应付会计;11:副总)
begin tran PurchaseRequestInfo_P declare @Manager bigint,@Manager_R nvarchar(50)
---送签 if(@utype=1) begin declare @PayRequestAmt decimal(18,2),@OrgGroup_Auto bigint,@RequestUser bigint,@Num int , @MaxLev int,@Request_Type int,@Inc_Auto int ,@CheckUser bigint,@PayType int ,@CheckUser_R nvarchar(50),@num_Y int, @ChuManager bigint,@LKInc_Auto int,@RequestAmt decimal(18,2) ,@GernalManager nvarchar(50),@GernalManager_R nvarchar(50),@TitleLevel int
select @PayRequestAmt=PayRequestAmt,@RequestUser=RequestUser,@Inc_Auto=Inc_Auto ,@Request_Type=Request_Type,@PayType=Pay_Type ,@LKInc_Auto=LKInc_Auto,@RequestAmt=RequestAmt from PurchaseRequest where PurchaseRequest_Auto=@PurchaseRequest_Auto select @TitleLevel=isnull((select TitleLevel from v_emp where User_Auto=@RequestUser),0)
--若重复送签先删除已送签未审核数据 以免产生重复审核数据---- delete t2 from PurchaseRequest t1,PurchaseRRFlow t2 where t1.PurchaseRequest_Auto=t2.RR_Auto and t2.Type=1 and t2.Reject=0 and t2.[Type]=1 and t2.[Status]=0 and t1.PurchaseRequest_Auto=@PurchaseRequest_Auto if (@@ERROR!=0) begin goto error end
select @OrgGroup_Auto=OrgGroup_Auto from OrgGroupEmp where User_Auto=@RequestUser --select @Manager=PurchaseRR_Flower,@Manager_R='总经理' from PurchaseRR_Flower where PurchaseRR_Type=0 and Inc_Auto=@Inc_Auto--总经理 select @Manager=isnull((select PurchaseRR_Flower from PurchaseRR_Flower where PurchaseRR_Type=0 and Inc_Auto=@Inc_Auto),0),@Manager_R='总经理'--总经理 if(@Manager=0) begin select @Manager=PurchaseRR_Flower,@Manager_R='总经理' from PurchaseRR_Flower where PurchaseRR_Type=0 and Inc_Auto=1 end ------资讯类------- if(@Request_Type=2) begin insert into PurchaseRRFlow(RR_Auto,AppSeq,AppUserID,LevNow,Status,IsAgent,AgentUserID,CUser,[Type],AppRole) select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,1 AppSeq,User_Auto AppUserID,0 LevNow ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],'资讯主管'AppRole from v_Emp where DepCode='14300' and TitleLevel=30 and IsOn=1 end
select @Num=COUNT(OrgGroup_Check_Auto) from OrgGroup_Check where OrgGroup_Auto=@OrgGroup_Auto and Check_Type=@Request_Type select @MaxLev=0 select @OrgGroup_Auto=OrgGroup_Auto from OrgGroupEmp where User_Auto=@RequestUser select @Num=COUNT(OrgGroup2Emp_Auto) from OrgGroup2Emp where OrgGroup_Auto=@OrgGroup_Auto and User_Auto!=@RequestUser -----部门审核 if(@Num>0) begin select User_Auto,identity(int,1,1) appseq into #a from OrgGroup2Emp where OrgGroup_Auto=@OrgGroup_Auto and User_Auto!=@RequestUser order by ACLType if(@Request_Type=2) begin insert into PurchaseRRFlow(RR_Auto,AppSeq,AppUserID,LevNow,Status,IsAgent,AgentUserID,CUser,[Type],AppRole) select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,appseq+1 AppSeq,User_Auto AppUserID,0 LevNow ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],'主管'AppRole from #a if (@@ERROR!=0 or @@ROWCOUNT=0) begin goto error end end else begin insert into PurchaseRRFlow(RR_Auto,AppSeq,AppUserID,LevNow,Status,IsAgent,AgentUserID,CUser,[Type],AppRole) select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,appseq AppSeq,User_Auto AppUserID,0 LevNow ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],'主管'AppRole from #a if (@@ERROR!=0 or @@ROWCOUNT=0) begin goto error end end select @MaxLev=MAX(AppSeq) from PurchaseRRFlow where RR_Auto=@PurchaseRequest_Auto and Reject=0 and [Type]=1 group by RR_Auto,[Type] end
declare @WangYinCasher bigint,@CaiWuManager bigint,@YingFuKuaiji bigint,@XianjinCasher bigint ,@WangYinCasher_R nvarchar(50),@CaiWuManager_R nvarchar(50),@YingFuKuaiji_R nvarchar(50),@XianjinCasher_R nvarchar(50) select @CaiWuManager=PurchaseRR_Flower,@CaiWuManager_R='财务主管' from PurchaseRR_Flower where PurchaseRR_Type=3 and Inc_Auto=@Inc_Auto--财务主管 select @YingFuKuaiji=PurchaseRR_Flower,@YingFuKuaiji_R='应付会计' from PurchaseRR_Flower where PurchaseRR_Type=10 and Inc_Auto=@Inc_Auto--应付会计 select @WangYinCasher=PurchaseRR_Flower,@WangYinCasher_R='网银出纳' from PurchaseRR_Flower where PurchaseRR_Type=5 and Inc_Auto=@Inc_Auto--网银出纳 select @XianjinCasher=PurchaseRR_Flower,@XianjinCasher_R='现金出纳' from PurchaseRR_Flower where PurchaseRR_Type=4 and Inc_Auto=@LKInc_Auto--现金出纳
--暂借金额小于请款金额 if(@PayRequestAmt>0) begin if(@TitleLevel=30 or @TitleLevel=21 or @TitleLevel=31) begin select @MaxLev=@MaxLev+1 -- if not exists(select OrgGroup2Emp_Auto from OrgGroup2Emp where OrgGroup_Auto=@OrgGroup_Auto and User_Auto=@Manager) -- begin -- insert into PurchaseRRFlow(RR_Auto,AppSeq,AppUserID,LevNow,Status,IsAgent,AgentUserID,CUser,[Type],AppRole) -- select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,@MaxLev AppSeq,@Manager AppUserID,0 LevNow -- ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],@Manager_R AppRole --总经理 -- if (@@ERROR!=0 or @@ROWCOUNT=0) -- begin -- goto error -- end -- select @MaxLev=@MaxLev+1 --end insert into PurchaseRRFlow(RR_Auto,AppSeq,AppUserID,LevNow,Status,IsAgent,AgentUserID,CUser,[Type],AppRole) select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,@MaxLev AppSeq,@YingFuKuaiji AppUserID,0 LevNow ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],@YingFuKuaiji_R AppRole ---应付会计 if (@@ERROR!=0 or @@ROWCOUNT=0) begin goto error end select @MaxLev=@MaxLev+1 if(@PayType=4 or @PayType=3)-----网银、现金支票 begin insert into PurchaseRRFlow(RR_Auto,AppSeq,AppUserID,LevNow,Status,IsAgent,AgentUserID,CUser,[Type],AppRole) select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,@MaxLev AppSeq,@WangYinCasher AppUserID,0 LevNow ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],@WangYinCasher_R AppRole --网银会计 if (@@ERROR!=0 or @@ROWCOUNT=0) begin goto error end end end else begin --判断是否为业务员 大于1000金额需要处主管审核 select @num_Y=COUNT(t1.OrgGroup_TManager_Auto) from OrgGroup_TManager t1,OrgGroupEmp t2 where t2.OrgGroup_Auto=t1.OrgGroup_Auto and t2.User_Auto=@RequestUser if(@num_Y>0) begin select @GernalManager=TManager_Auto,@GernalManager_R='副总经理' --营业副总 from OrgGroup_TManager t1,OrgGroupEmp t2 where t2.OrgGroup_Auto=t1.OrgGroup_Auto and t2.User_Auto=@RequestUser end else begin select @GernalManager=isnull((select PurchaseRR_Flower from PurchaseRR_Flower where PurchaseRR_Type=11 and Inc_Auto=@Inc_Auto),0),@GernalManager_R='副总经理' --副总经理 end if(@GernalManager=0) begin select @GernalManager=PurchaseRR_Flower,@GernalManager_R='副总经理' from PurchaseRR_Flower where PurchaseRR_Type=11 and Inc_Auto=1 end select @MaxLev=@MaxLev+1 if(@Request_Type!=4) begin if(@PayType=4 or @PayType=3)-----网银、现金支票 begin if(@PayRequestAmt <=1000) begin insert into PurchaseRRFlow(RR_Auto,AppSeq,AppUserID,LevNow,Status,IsAgent,AgentUserID,CUser,[Type],AppRole) select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,@MaxLev AppSeq,@YingFuKuaiji AppUserID,0 LevNow ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],@YingFuKuaiji_R AppRole ---应付会计 union all select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,@MaxLev+1 AppSeq,@WangYinCasher AppUserID,0 LevNow ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],@WangYinCasher_R AppRole --网银会计 if (@@ERROR!=0 or @@ROWCOUNT=0) begin goto error end end if(@PayRequestAmt>1000 and @PayRequestAmt <5000) --副总核决-- begin insert into PurchaseRRFlow(RR_Auto,AppSeq,AppUserID,LevNow,Status,IsAgent,AgentUserID,CUser,[Type],AppRole) select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,@MaxLev AppSeq,@GernalManager AppUserID,0 LevNow ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],@GernalManager_R AppRole --副总 union all select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,@MaxLev+1 AppSeq,@YingFuKuaiji AppUserID,0 LevNow ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],@YingFuKuaiji_R AppRole ---应付会计 union all select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,@MaxLev+2 AppSeq,@WangYinCasher AppUserID,0 LevNow ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],@WangYinCasher_R AppRole --网银会计 --end if (@@ERROR!=0 or @@ROWCOUNT=0) begin goto error end end if(@PayRequestAmt>=5000) --总经理核决-- begin insert into PurchaseRRFlow(RR_Auto,AppSeq,AppUserID,LevNow,Status,IsAgent,AgentUserID,CUser,[Type],AppRole) select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,@MaxLev AppSeq,@GernalManager AppUserID,0 LevNow ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],@GernalManager_R AppRole --副总 union all select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,@MaxLev+1 AppSeq,@Manager AppUserID,0 LevNow ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],@Manager_R AppRole --总经理 union all select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,@MaxLev+2 AppSeq,@YingFuKuaiji AppUserID,0 LevNow ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],@YingFuKuaiji_R AppRole ---应付会计 union all select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,@MaxLev+3 AppSeq,@WangYinCasher AppUserID,0 LevNow ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],@WangYinCasher_R AppRole --网银会计 if (@@ERROR!=0 or @@ROWCOUNT=0) begin goto error end end end else---现金 begin insert into PurchaseRRFlow(RR_Auto,AppSeq,AppUserID,LevNow,Status,IsAgent,AgentUserID,CUser,[Type],AppRole) select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,@MaxLev AppSeq,@YingFuKuaiji AppUserID,0 LevNow ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],@YingFuKuaiji_R AppRole ---应付会计 end end else----业务招待费 begin if(@PayType=1)---现金 begin insert into PurchaseRRFlow(RR_Auto,AppSeq,AppUserID,LevNow,Status,IsAgent,AgentUserID,CUser,[Type],AppRole) select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,@MaxLev AppSeq,@GernalManager AppUserID,0 LevNow ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],@GernalManager_R AppRole --副总 union all select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,@MaxLev+1 AppSeq,@Manager AppUserID,0 LevNow ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],@Manager_R AppRole --总经理 union all select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,@MaxLev+2 AppSeq,@YingFuKuaiji AppUserID,0 LevNow ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],@YingFuKuaiji_R AppRole ---应付会计
if (@@ERROR!=0 or @@ROWCOUNT=0) begin goto error end end else-----网银、现金支票 begin insert into PurchaseRRFlow(RR_Auto,AppSeq,AppUserID,LevNow,Status,IsAgent,AgentUserID,CUser,[Type],AppRole) select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,@MaxLev AppSeq,@GernalManager AppUserID,0 LevNow ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],@GernalManager_R AppRole --副总 union all select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,@MaxLev+1 AppSeq,@Manager AppUserID,0 LevNow ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],@Manager_R AppRole --总经理 union all select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,@MaxLev+2 AppSeq,@YingFuKuaiji AppUserID,0 LevNow ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],@YingFuKuaiji_R AppRole ---应付会计 union all select @PurchaseRequest_Auto RR_Auto,@MaxLev+3 AppSeq,@WangYinCasher AppUserID,0 LevNow ,0 Status,0 IsAgent,0 AgentUserID,@UserId CUser,1 [Type],@WangYinCasher_R AppRole --网银会计
if (@@ERROR!=0 or @@ROWCOUNT=0) begin goto error end end
end end end update PurchaseRequest set [Status]=10,MUser=@UserId,MDT=GETDATE() where PurchaseRequest_Auto=@PurchaseRequest_Auto if (@@ERROR!=0 or @@ROWCOUNT=0) begin goto error end
if exists(select PurchaseRequest_Auto from PurchaseRequisition where PurchaseRequest_Auto=@PurchaseRequest_Auto) begin update PurchaseRequisition set [Status]=25,MUser=@UserId,MDT=GETDATE() where PurchaseRequest_Auto=@PurchaseRequest_Auto if (@@ERROR!=0 ) begin goto error end end
declare @org_auto bigint select @org_auto=Org_Auto from v_Emp where User_Auto=@UserId if(@org_auto in(243,241,244,245)) --专车事业部 begin if exists(select * from PurchaseRRFlow where RR_Auto=@PurchaseRequest_Auto and AppUserID=21737) --宋信忠 begin update PurchaseRRFlow set AppUserID=21381 where RR_Auto=@PurchaseRequest_Auto and AppUserID=21737 end end drop table #a end
